remarks: Limit of the multiplication of two functions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
mullimcf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
mullimcf.g $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> CC ) $.
mullimcf.h $e |- H = ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) x. ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
mullimcf.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( F limCC D ) ) $.
mullimcf.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( G limCC D ) ) $.
mullimcf $p |- ( ph -> ( B x. C ) e. ( H limCC D ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d D x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d ph x $.
